ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We acknowledge the core facility Laboratory of Electron Microscopy, Biology Centre CAS supported by the MEYS CR (LM2018129 Czech-BioImaging) and ERDF (No. CZ.02.1.01/0.0/0.0/16_013/0001775). The authors thank Jiří Vaněček and Martina Tesařová for their valuable help with SEM imaging.
